# Pull Request

## Summary
- [ ] Purpose and scope described
- [ ] Links to related issues/PRs

## Checklist (CoSteward/BPOE)
- [ ] Repo-first; small branch; squash-merge
- [ ] Added receipts/notes if needed
- [ ] CI green or justified
- [ ] No large diffs w/o reason
